title: Controllers
intro_text: Controllers are responsible for handling incoming **requests** and returning **responses** to the client.
ref_text: Defining a controller in the MBC Serverless Framework is the same as in Nest.js, so please refer to this section using the [provided link](https://docs.nestjs.com/controllers).
invoke_context_note: To get the invoke context, you can provide the following argument in the controller function.
example_intro: In the following example we'll use the `@Controller()` decorator, which is required to define a basic controller; `@Auth(ROLE.ADMIN)` decorator, which is specified for authorization purpose; and `@ApiTags('cat')` to attach a controller to a specific tag.
